CATSPYAnimateCmdHdr.Title: Play
CATSPYAnimateCmdHdr.ShortHelp: Plays the animated simulation experience content.
CATSPYMSRAccessCmdHdr.Title: Choose Content
CATSPYMSRAccessCmdHdr.ShortHelp: Explores the accessible simulation experience content.
CATSPYMSRAccessCmdHdr.LongHelp: Switch between content such as results, and sequences when applicable.
CATSPYCameraSelectorCmdHdr.Title: Choose Camera
CATSPYPublishTo3DSwYmCmdHdr.Title: Publish to 3DSwym
CATSPYPublishTo3DSwYmCmdHdr.ShortHelp: Publishes a screen capture of the current view to 3DSwym communities or conversations.
CATSPYPublishTo3DSwYmCmdHdr.LongHelp: Publish your content as a post, as a media, as a question, or as an idea.
CATSPYOpenFrom3DSpaceCmdHdr.Title: Open Physics Simulation in 3DPlay
CATSPYOpenFrom3DSpaceCmdHdr.ShortHelp: Opens original Physics Simulation in 3DPlay for Dashboard.
CATSPYOpenFrom3DSpaceCmdHdr.LongHelp:
This media has been produced from a Physics Simulation in 3DSpace.

Discover original 3DSpace data in 3DPlay for Dashboard.

Requires access to the Collab Space hosting the original data.
CATSPYHideShowCtxCmdHdr.Title: Hide/Show
CATSPYHideShowCtxCmdHdr.LongHelp: Toggle the visibility state for the selected elements.
CATSPYHideShowCmdHdr.Title: Hide/Show
CATSPYHideShowCmdHdr.LongHelp: Toggle the visibility state for the selected elements.
CATSPYHideShowResetCmdHdr.Title: Display All
CATSPYHideShowResetCmdHdr.ShortHelp: Restores all geometry into visible space.
CATSPYHideShowLegendCmdHdr.Title: Hide/Show Legend
CATSPYHideShowLegendCmdHdr.ShortHelp: Shows or hides the legend for the results.
CATSPYHideShowLegendCmdHdr.LongHelp: The legend displays the range of values and contour spectrum, and the deformation scale factor.
CATSPYShowHideExtremaCmdHdr.Title: Show/Hide Min/Max
CATSPYShowHideExtremaCmdHdr.ShortHelp: Shows or hides the extrema (minimum and maximum) in the results.
CATSPYShowHideExtremaCmdHdr.LongHelp: When the extrema are in the interior of the model, use the Section tool to help visualize the location.
CATSPYRHESwitchCmdHdr.Title: Switch Material
CATSPYRHESwitchCmdHdr.ShortHelp: Applies material rendering to the selected elements.
CATSPYRHESwitchCmdHdr.LongHelp: Switch between the color coded engineering view and the more realistic material view.
CATSPYRHESwitchResetCmdHdr.Title: Restore
CATSPYRHESwitchResetCmdHdr.ShortHelp: Restore all geometry with default rendering
CATSPYRHESwitchResetCmdHdr.LongHelp: Restore all geometry with default rendering for current Switch Material command.
CATSPYTranspCmdHdr.Title: Switch Transparency
CATSPYTranspCmdHdr.ShortHelp: Applies semi-transparency to the selected elements.
CATSPYTranspCmdHdr.LongHelp: Switch the semi-transparent state for the selected elements.
CATSPYTranspResetCmdHdr.Title: Restore
CATSPYTranspResetCmdHdr.ShortHelp: Restore all geometry with default opacity
CATSPYTranspResetCmdHdr.LongHelp: Restore all geometry with default opacity for current Switch Transparency command.
CATSPYSelectAllCmdHdr.Title: Switch All
CATSPYSelectAllCmdHdr.LongHelp: Switch the state of all geometry for current visualization command.
CATSPYReverseSelectCmdHdr.Title: Keep Only
CATSPYReverseSelectCmdHdr.ShortHelp: Keeps only next selection with default visualization state.
CATSPYReverseSelectCmdHdr.LongHelp: Switch the state of all geometry except the next selected items.
CATSPYStreamlinesCmdHdr.Title: Streamlines
CATSPYStreamlinesCmdHdr.ShortHelp: Show or hide the list of available streamlines
CATSPYStreamlinesCmdHdr.LongHelp: Helps selecting the available streamlines to manage their visiblity.
